uk.org.taverna.databundle

Class DataBundles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.purl.wf4ever.robundle.Bundles
      • uk.org.taverna.databundle.DataBundles

  • public class DataBundles
extends Bundles
    Utility functions for dealing with data bundles.

    The style of using this class is similar to that of Files. In fact, a data bundle is implemented as a set of Paths.

    Author:
    Stian Soiland-Reyes
